title: Why would you Buff Ahri and leave so many champs untouched for so long?
body:
Trundle... Wukong... Mundo... Etc.

Why leave these champs in the dust for so long, but feel the need to buff a champ who has been a safe midlane pick for as long as I can remember. Also, wtf did you buff twitch for after 1 patch.

WHAT IS HAPPENING IROT!?

replies.body:
Ahri's been out of meta, out of mind *for months.* What is this argument?

And Twitch wasn't even buffed. His nerf just got cut in half.

and trundle is pick/ban in lcs/lck

buffing him would be a retarded move

>  but feel the need to buff a champ who has been a safe midlane pick for as long as I can remember.

If you actually read what the rioters had planned for her you would know that they are nerfing her safety in return for buffing her damage {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
My guess is ahri is popular. Also it should be painfully obvious at this point that riot has a huge bias for ADCs.

because ahri mains are asking for this change since early S5 and we are getting it now in (almost) half S8

> leave so many champs untouched for so long?

for so long you say? it took 3 years and half for doing a change in her kit that everyone was asking for,so as ahri main i could say exactly the same

Mundo is more likely going to get nerfed than buffed.

But they all need reworks, not balance changes.
Why would they nerf Mundo? He's trash lol
